summary: Completed Phase 2 Content Management testing. All 32 backend API tests passed (100%). Admin content management endpoints properly require authentication. Frontend admin content page correctly redirects to login for unauthenticated users.
passed_tests: Admin /admin/content redirects to login when unauthenticated
critical_code_review_comments: AdminContent.jsx has good data-testid coverage for all interactive elements
Error handling properly implemented with toast notifications
React Hook useEffect warnings in multiple pages (non-critical, existing from Phase 1)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 Content Management testing complete. All admin content CRUD endpoints (certifications, labs, assessments, projects) properly require authentication. Content reordering endpoints also protected. Frontend AdminContent.jsx has proper data-testid attributes. To test authenticated admin functionality, need to sign in via Google OAuth (first user becomes super_admin). Admin roles: super_admin, content_admin, lab_admin, finance_admin, support_admin.
notes: Cannot test authenticated admin content management flows without actual Google OAuth login. All admin content API endpoints are properly protected with RBAC. The AdminContent.jsx component includes: tabbed interface for content types, search/filter functionality, create/edit modals, and delete confirmation.
